verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-da-Vidof David מִזְמ֑וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor; A Psalm אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei O God תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-Ti, of my praise אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃ <S%H2790><s%> te-che-Rash. Hold not thy peace

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for פִ֪י <S%H6310><s%> fi For the mouth רָשָׁ֡ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha' of the wicked וּֽפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> u-fi- and the mouth מִ֭רְמָה <S%H4820><s%> Mir-mah of the deceitful עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against פָּתָ֑חוּ <S%H6605><s%> pa-Ta-chu; are opened דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru against me they have spoken אִ֝תִּ֗י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti, against לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> le-Shon tongue שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. against me with a lying

וְדִבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> ve-div-Rei me about also with words שִׂנְאָ֣ה <S%H8135><s%> sin-'Ah of hatred סְבָב֑וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> se-va-Vu-ni; They compassed וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu-ni and fought חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam. against me without a cause

תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> ta-chat- return אַהֲבָתִ֥י <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-va-Ti For my love יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <S%H7853><s%> yis-te-Nu-ni, they are my adversaries וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I תְפִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-Lah. but I [give myself unto] prayer

וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-Si-mu And they have rewarded עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> Ra-'ah me evil תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah; for good וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה <S%H8135><s%> ve-sin-'Ah, and hatred תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat Thahash אַהֲבָתִֽי׃ <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-va-Ti. for my love

הַפְקֵ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> haf-Ked Set עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha'; thou a wicked man וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> ve-sa-Tan, over him and let Satan יַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No. at his right hand

בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ <S%H8199><s%> be-hish-Sha-fe-tov When he shall be judged יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze let him be רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha'; condemned וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8605><s%> u-te-fil-la-To, and let his prayer תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לַֽחֲטָאָֽה׃ <S%H2401><s%> La-cha-ta-'Ah. become sin

יִֽהְיֽוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yu- Let יָמָ֥יו <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mav Let his days מְעַטִּ֑ים <S%H4592><s%> me-'at-Tim; be few פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ <S%H6486><s%> pe-kud-da-To, his office יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach take אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher. [and] let another

יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yu- Let בָנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav Let his children יְתוֹמִ֑ים <S%H3490><s%> ye-to-Mim; be fatherless וְ֝אִשְׁתּוֹ <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-to and his wife אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-Nah. a widow

וְנ֤וֹעַ <S%H5128><s%> ve-No-a' be continually יָנ֣וּעוּ <S%H5128><s%> ya-Nu-'u vagabonds בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav Let his children וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ <S%H7592><s%> ve-shi-'E-lu; and beg וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ <S%H1875><s%> ve-da-re-Shu, let them seek מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2723><s%> me-cha-re-vo-tei-Hem. [their bread] also out of their desolate places

יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H5367><s%> ye-nak-Kesh catch נ֭וֹשֶׁה <S%H5383><s%> Noo-sheh Let the extortioner לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֑וֹ lo; וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ <S%H962><s%> ve-ya-Voz-zu spoil זָרִ֣ים <S%H2114><s%> za-Rim all that he hath and let the strangers יְגִיעֽוֹ׃ <S%H3018><s%> ye-gi-'O. his labour אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- become

ל֭וֹ lo מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> mo-Shech Let there be none to extend חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed; mercy וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Let there be none יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן <S%H2603><s%> cho-Nen, unto him neither let there be any to favour לִיתוֹמָֽיו׃ <S%H3490><s%> li-to-Mav. his fatherless children

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- Let אַחֲרִית֥וֹ <S%H319><s%> a-cha-ri-To Let his posterity לְהַכְרִ֑ית <S%H3772><s%> le-hach-Rit; be cut off בְּד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> be-Dor [and] in the generation אַ֝חֵ֗ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher, following יִמַּ֥ח <S%H4229><s%> yim-Mach be blotted out שְׁמָֽם׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mam. let their name

יִזָּכֵ֤ר׀ <S%H2142><s%> yiz-za-Cher be remembered עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von Let the iniquity אֲ֭בֹתָיו <S%H1><s%> 'A-vo-tav of his fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; with the LORD וְחַטַּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> ve-chat-Tat and let not the sin אִ֝מּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, of his mother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תִּמָּֽח׃ <S%H4229><s%> tim-Mach. be blotted out

יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu Let נֶֽגֶד־ <S%H5048><s%> ne-ged- them be before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Let them be before the LORD תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; continually וְיַכְרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> ve-yach-Ret that he may cut off מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of them from the earth זִכְרָֽם׃ <S%H2143><s%> zich-Ram. the memory

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, Because אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not זָכַר֮ <S%H2142><s%> za-Char Because that he remembered עֲשׂ֪וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot not to shew חָ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed mercy וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-Dof but persecuted אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni the poor וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן <S%H34><s%> Ve-'ev-yon and needy וְנִכְאֵ֨ה <S%H5218><s%> ve-nich-'Eh broken לֵבָ֬ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav in heart לְמוֹתֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> le-mo-Tet. that he might even slay

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב <S%H157><s%> vai-ye-'e-Hav As he loved קְ֭לָלָה <S%H7045><s%> Ke-la-lah cursing וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ <S%H935><s%> vat-te-vo-'E-hu; so let it come וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- did not חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz unto him as he delighted בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> biv-ra-Chah, not in blessing וַתִּרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> vat-tir-Chak so let it be far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. at

וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> vai-yil-Bash As he clothed קְלָלָ֗ה <S%H7045><s%> ke-la-Lah, himself with cursing כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ <S%H4055><s%> ke-Mad-Do like as with his garment וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo so let it come כַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> cham-Ma-yim like water בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bo; into his bowels וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ve-chash-She-men, and like oil בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H6106><s%> be-'atz-mo-Tav. into his bones

תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> te-hi- become ל֭וֹ lo כְּבֶ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> ke-Ve-ged Let it be unto him as the garment יַעְטֶ֑ה <S%H5844><s%> ya'-Teh; [which] covereth וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח <S%H4206><s%> u-le-Me-zach, him and for a girdle תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid continually יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃ <S%H2296><s%> yach-ge-Re-ha. wherewith he is girded

זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <S%H6468><s%> pe-'ul-Lat [Let] this [be] the reward שֹׂ֭טְנַי <S%H7853><s%> te-nai of mine adversaries מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; from the LORD וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים <S%H1696><s%> ve-had-doe-Rim and of them that speak רָ֝֗ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. against my soul

וְאַתָּ֤ה׀ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah O יְה֘וִ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh thou for me O GOD אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, the Lord עֲ‍ ֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'aseh- But do אִ֭תִּי <S%H854><s%> 'It-ti for לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; for thy name's כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [is] good חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-cha, sake because thy mercy הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni. deliver

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni For I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon and needy אָנֹ֑כִי <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi; and my וְ֝לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi, and my heart חָלַ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> cha-Lal is wounded בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bi. within

כְּצֵל־ <S%H6738><s%> ke-tzel- like the shadow כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ <S%H5186><s%> kin-to-To when it declineth נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> ne-he-La-che-ti; I am gone נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי <S%H5287><s%> nin-'Ar-ti, I am tossed up and down כָּֽאַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H697><s%> Ka-'ar-Beh. as the locust

בִּ֭רְכַּי <S%H1290><s%> Bir-kai My knees כָּשְׁל֣וּ <S%H3782><s%> ka-she-Lu are weak מִצּ֑וֹם <S%H6685><s%> mitz-Tzom; through fasting וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sa-Ri, and my flesh כָּחַ֥שׁ <S%H3584><s%> ka-Chash faileth מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> mish-Sha-men. of fatness

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have become חֶרְפָּ֣ה <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah I became also a reproach לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem; they יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U-ni, unto them [when] they looked יְנִיע֥וּן <S%H5128><s%> ye-ni-'Un upon me they shaked רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham. their heads

עָ֭זְרֵנִי <S%H5826><s%> 'A-ze-re-ni Help יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; my God ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni O save כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> che-chas-De-cha. me according to thy mercy

וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> Ve-ye-de-'u That they may know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָ֣דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Ya-de-cha that this [is] thy hand זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; likewise אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [that] thou LORD עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tah. hast done

יְקַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H7043><s%> ye-kal-lu- Let them curse הֵמָּה֮ <S%H1992><s%> hem-Mah like וְאַתָּ֪ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah You תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> te-Va-Rech but bless קָ֤מוּ׀ <S%H6965><s%> Ka-mu thou when they arise וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> vai-ye-Vo-shu, let them be ashamed וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-de-Cha but let thy servant יִשְׂמָֽח׃ <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach. rejoice

יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H3847><s%> yil-be-Shu be clothed שׂוֹטְנַ֣י <S%H7853><s%> sot-Nai Let mine adversaries כְּלִמָּ֑ה <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-Mah; with shame וְיַעֲט֖וּ <S%H5844><s%> ve-ya-'a-Tu and let them cover כַמְעִ֣יל <S%H4598><s%> cham-'Il as with a mantle בָּשְׁתָּֽם׃ <S%H1322><s%> ba-she-Tam. themselves with their own confusion

א֘וֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> o-Deh praise יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od I will greatly בְּפִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi; with my mouth וּבְת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> u-ve-Toch him among רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim the multitude אֲהַֽלְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> 'a-Hal-Len-nu. yea I will praise

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יַ֭עֲמֹד <S%H5975><s%> Ya-'a-mod For he shall stand לִימִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> li-Min at the right hand אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> ev-Yon; of the poor לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a', to save מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י <S%H8199><s%> mish-sho-fe-Tei [him] from those that condemn נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho. his soul
